description: Enables a mob to use kinetic weaponry by intermittently charging at its target and repositioning afterward.

approach_distance.description: The distance to the target within which the mob begins using its kinetic weapon.

attack_once.description: Allows the mob to perform this melee attack behavior only once during its lifetime.

can_spread_on_fire.description: Allows the mob, if on fire and empty handed, to ignite its target upon a successful attack.

cooldown_distance.description: The distance the mob retreats to after all of the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component's "max_duration" values have elapsed. After reaching this position and once "cooldown" has elapsed, the mob will approach again. This value is added to the reach midpoint.

cooldown_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the mob's movement speed while on cooldown.

cooldown_time.description: Cooldown time, in seconds, between consecutive attacks.

inner_boundary_time_increase.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the target is beyond "path_inner_boundary".

max_path_time.description: Maximum base time, in seconds, before recalculating a new attack path to the target (before increases are applied).

melee_fov.description: Field of view, in degrees, used by the hard-coded sensing component to detect a valid attack target.

min_path_time.description: Minimum base time, in seconds, before recalculating a new attack path to the target (before increases are applied).

outer_boundary_time_increase.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the target is beyond "path_outer_boundary".

path_fail_time_increase.description: Time, in seconds, added to the attack path recalculation interval when the mob cannot move along the current path.

path_inner_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_time_increase".

path_outer_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_time_increase".

random_stop_interval.description: Defines a 1-in-N chance for the mob to stop its current attack, where N equals "random_stop_interval".

reposition_distance.description: The distance the mob retreats to once the target is closer than the midpoint of the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component's minimum and maximum "reach". After reaching this position, the mob will charge again. This value is added to the reach midpoint.

reposition_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the mob's movement speed while repositioning.

require_complete_path.description: Specifies whether a full navigation path from the mob to the target is required.

speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the mob's movement speed when moving toward its target.

track_target.description: Allows the mob to track its target even if it lacks a hard-coded sensing component.

weapon_min_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to each "min_speed" and "min_relative_speed" condition in the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component.

weapon_reach_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to the item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component's "reach".

x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation, in degrees, on the X-axis while the mob is trying to look at its target.

y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation, in degrees, on the Y-axis while the mob is trying to look at its target.

title: minecraft:behavior.use_kinetic_weapon
